mapper.sql:
SELECT ROLE_ID /* 권한코드 */ , ROLE_NAME /* 권한명 */ , DESCRIPTION /* 설명 */ , ADMIN_YN /* 관리자여부 */ , EXCEPT_MAP_YN /* 매핑제외여부 */ , STATUS /* 상태 */ FROM AP_ROLE WHERE 1=1
AND ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID} /* 권한코드 */
AND ROLE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ROLE_NAME} || '%' /* 권한명 */
ORDER BY ROLE_ID DESC

SELECT ROLE_ID /* 권한ID */ , ROLE_NAME /* 권한명 */ , DESCRIPTION /* 설명 */ , SUBSTR(COMP_CD,1,3) AS CD_SUBSD /* 회사코드 1단계 */ , COMP_CD /* 회사코드 2단계 */ , STATUS /* 상태 */ , ADMIN_YN /* 관리자여부 */ , EXCEPT_MAP_YN /* 매핑제외여부 */ , REG_USER_ID /* 등록사용자ID */ , UPD_USER_ID /* 수정사용자ID */ , TO_CHAR(REG_DATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATETIME /* 등록일시 */ , TO_CHAR(UPD_DATETIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DATETIME /* 수정일시 */ FROM AP_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID= #{ROLE_ID}

SELECT AR.ROLE_ID , AR.ROLE_NAME , AR.DESCRIPTION , AR.COMP_CD , AR.STATUS , AR.ADMIN_YN , AR.EXCEPT_MAP_YN , ARC.ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE , DECODE(ARC.ROLE_COMPOSITION_TYPE , 'U' , (SELECT USER_NM FROM SYS_USER WHERE USER_ID = ARC.ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE) , 'D' , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM SYS_DEPARTMENT WHERE DEPT_ID = ARC.ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE) , 'P' , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM SYS_CODE WHERE CODE_CATEGORY_ID = 'POSITION_CD' AND CODE = ARC.ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE) ) ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE_NM , ARC.ROLE_COMPOSITION_TYPE , C.CODE_NAME ROLE_COMPOSITION_TYPE_NM , ARC.REG_USER_ID , U.USER_NM AS REG_USER_NM , ARC.REG_DATETIME , ARC.UPD_USER_ID , ARC.UPD_DATETIME FROM AP_ROLE AR INNER JOIN AP_ROLE_COMPOSITION ARC ON AR.ROLE_ID = ARC.ROLE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_CODE C ON ARC.ROLE_COMPOSITION_TYPE = C.CODE AND CODE_CATEGORY_ID ='ROLE_COMPOSITION_TYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_USER U ON ARC.UPD_USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE AR.ROLE_ID= #{ROLE_ID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AP_ROLE_COMPOSITION( ROLE_ID /* 권한ID */ , ROLE_COMPOSITION_TYPE /* 권한구성유형 */ , ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE /* 권한구성코드 */ , REG_USER_ID /* 등록사용자ID */ , REG_DATETIME /* 등록일시 */ , UPD_USER_ID /* 수정사용자ID */ , UPD_DATETIME /* 수정일시 */ ) VALUES ( #{ROLE_ID} /* 권한ID */ , #{ROLE_COMPOSITION_TYPE} /* 권한구성유형 */ , #{ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE} /* 권한구성코드 */ , #{user.id} /* 등록사용자ID */ , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 등록일시 */ , #{user.id} /* 수정사용자ID */ , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 수정일시 */ )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AP_ROLE_COMPOSITION WHERE ROLE_ID=#{ROLE_ID} /* 권한ID */ AND ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE=#{ROLE_COMPOSITION_CODE} /* 권한구성코드 */
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AP_ROLE( ROLE_ID /* 권한ID */ , ROLE_NAME /* 권한명 */ , DESCRIPTION /* 설명*/ , COMP_CD /* 회사코드 */ , STATUS /* 상태*/ , ADMIN_YN /* 관리자여부 */ , EXCEPT_MAP_YN /* 매핑제외여부 */ , REG_USER_ID /* 등록사용자ID */ , REG_DATETIME /* 등록일시 */ , UPD_USER_ID /* 수정사용자ID */ , UPD_DATETIME /* 수정일시 */ ) VALUES ( #{ROLE_ID} /* 권한ID */ , #{ROLE_NAME} /* 권한명 */ , #{DESCRIPTION} /* 설명 */ , #{COMP_CD} /* 회사코드 */ , #{STATUS} /* 상태 */ , #{ADMIN_YN} /* 관리자여부 */ , #{EXCEPT_MAP_YN} /* 매핑제외여부 */ , #{user.id} /* 등록사용자ID */ , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 등록일시 */ , #{user.id} /* 수정사용자ID */ , CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 수정일시 */ )
mapper.update:
UPDATE AP_ROLE SET UPD_USER_ID = #{user.id} /* 수정사용자ID */ , UPD_DATETIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP /* 수정일시 */
, ROLE_NAME = #{ROLE_NAME} /* 권한명 */
, DESCRIPTION = #{DESCRIPTION} /* 설명 */
, COMP_CD = #{COMP_CD} /* 회사코드 */
, STATUS = #{STATUS} /* 상태 */
, ADMIN_YN = #{ADMIN_YN} /* 관리자여부 */
, EXCEPT_MAP_YN = #{EXCEPT_MAP_YN} /* 매핑제외여부 */
WHERE ROLE_ID = #{ROLE_ID} /* 권한ID */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AP_ROLE WHERE ROLE_ID=#{ROLE_ID} /* 권한ID */
